thread.title: Ghostly happening in latest 'Paranormal Activity' film
thread.title_full: Ghostly happening in latest 'Paranormal Activity' film

title: Ghostly happening in latest 'Paranormal Activity' film
text:
Ghostly happening in latest 'Paranormal Activity' film Published 3:59 pm, Thursday, October 22, 2015 
It's the week before Halloween, and you know what that means: horror films at the multiplex. Also opening this week: 
"Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension": Also known as "The Horror Film Franchise That Wouldn't Go Away." The fifth movie - fourth sequel - in this series promises that for the first time, you will see the activity. Rated R: for language and some horror violence. Running time: 84 minutes. Entertainment News
